cardText.aboveLine:
+1 Action
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

+1 Action
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.
+2 Cards
cardText.belowLine: When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

cardText.aboveLine:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

+1 Card
+1 Action
The first time you play a Silver this turn, +$1.
Discard the top card of your deck. If it’s an Action card, you may play it.

+1 Card
+2 Actions.
Gain a card costing up to $4.
Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

+$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in their hand.
You may trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +$3.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Discard a card per empty Supply pile.
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.
+3 Cards.
You may play an Action card from your hand twice.
Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

+4 Cards
+1 Buy
Each other player draws a card.
Discard the top card of your deck. If it’s an Action card, you may play it.

+2 Cards
+1 Action.
Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterwards.

+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$1.
You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to $3 more than it.

+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse card.
Gain a card to your hand costing up to $5. Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
